resources.string:
What is this application? 
This is a home inventory application. 
It helps you maintain a list of stuff you have, with efficient interface and easy navigation. 
It's useful when: &LI;You have a remote storage and you don't remember what's there. &LI;You're not at home, but your family member/flatmate wants something. &LI;You're tidy and organized and want to know where your stuff belongs.


How can I leave feedback? What is feedback? 
Tap on the link below the application name/version in the About. 
Feel free to send any kind of comment, request, suggestion, error report; just about any thought regarding this application.
